skills.name: Implemented client website to meet the needs of Edmonton parents. Forums, resources, marketing pages
skills.description:
Through the time wortking with LinkingParents.com, we built up a local community of over 10,000, hosted events, helped bring support to those who needed it, and forged new relationships.
On the technical side, php-based technologies used throughout each version, and there were 4 major versions

skills.name: Collaborated with moderators and organizers to promote community events
